en.question: Will my total donation amount be given to the selected organisation?
en.answer: For the most part, yes. A small contribution is deducted by TWINT for the transfer and by RaiseNow for providing the donation environment.

en.question: How can I get a refund of a donation I have already made?
en.answer: Contact the supported organisation directly. You can find a link to the website directly in the organisationâ€™s profile. Depending on the organisation, the refund may take several days.

en.question: Can I support several organisations at the same time with one donation?
en.answer: Unfortunately this is not possible. Only one organisation can be supported per donation.

en.question: How do I get a donation receipt for my donation?
en.answer: If you have chosen the option that you would like to receive a donation receipt, you will receive it via email within the next few days. Depending on the organisation, this may take several days.

en.question: Can I set up recurring donations?
en.answer: Unfortunately this is not possible at the moment. However, we are working intensively to support this as soon as possible.

en.question: Why do I have to enter my personal data for each donation again?
en.answer: We respect your privacy. That is why we do not store any personal data you have entered in a browser cookie, nor connect them to your TWINT account.

en.question: Any other questions?
en.answer: Our RaiseNow support team will be happy to help you. Just write us an email at support@raisenow.com and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
